summary: I stopped by Anime Sempai Sunday! It was for a pretty short visit but I’m glad I was able to come in at all. For a first year...
body: I stopped by Anime Sempai Sunday! It was for a pretty short visit but I’m glad I was able to come in at all. For a first year con it was well organized and packed with people! Lots of love for my Aggretsuko cosplay as well. I got pictures in the photo booth. I’ll share them when I find them lol!! 😼😼

blog.name: kingdomofkitten
blog.title: Jacob A.K.A. KingdomOfKitten
blog.description:
I write sometimes. I think that says a lot about my career choices.

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/KingdomOfKitten

My Letterboxd: https://letterboxd.com/kingdomofkitten/

summary: Meeting The Families: Part 6
title: Meeting The Families: Part 6
body:
Ryota: *tending to a garden, with utmost precision and delicacy*

???: ….*screams in a slightly high-pitched tone of voice* I HATE EVERYTHING!

Ryota: Hmm? *stops to see a smaller red panda, clearly a child, angrily kicking over a bucket* ….Retsuko, what’s wrong?

Young Retsuko: I HATE SCHOOL, I HATE LIFE, I HATE EVERYONE, THAT’S WHAT’S WRONG!

Ryota: ….come here, come to your old man. Tell me what’s wrong.

Young Retsuko: *angrily stomping over to her father…before breaking down into tears* Nobody likes me! The teachers don’t like me, the other kids don’t like me, I don’t like it there!

Ryota: ….well, I like you. So does your mother, and your grandmother. So, it’s not wise to say nobody likes you.

Young Retsuko: …still! *starts sobbing*

Ryota: …*stops what he’s doing, and pulls her in for a hug* There, there.

Young Retsuko: ….daddy?

Ryota: Hmm?

Young Retsuko: ….do you think they’ll call me a monster? Because…you know…

Ryota: ….*sigh* some people will. What you have can be quite dangerous, if not contained properly.

???: But that doesn’t make you a monster in the slightest.

Young Retsuko: *looking up, to see Ryoko* Gramma!

Ryoko: What are you two blabbering about?

Ryota: Ah, she’s having troubles with school, mother. Apparently they’re not fond of her.

Ryoko: Aw. *pats Retsuko on the head* Well, you always have people who love you, dear. With or without the rage. Never forget that.

Young Retsuko: ….*sniff*….*nods* Okay.

Ryota: Besides, you’ll make friends soon enough. So no need to worry about it right now.

Rie: *distant, from inside the house* Dinner’s almost ready! Anyone hungry?

Ryoko: Ooh, I think it’s time to eat!

Young Retsuko: Yum! *pulls on Ryota’s sleeve* Come on, daddy! Let’s eat!

Ryota: *laughs* Okay, okay! *gets up* Sheesh, you girls will be the death of me one day, I swear.

Ryoko: Heh, only one way to find out!

*as they walk closer towards the house, the sky starts turning pitch black, with rain pouring, as Ryota looks up in concern….suddenly feeling older, and worn out*

Ryota: *pants a little* What the hell was…*looks down, and sees Ryoko, and a slightly older Retsuko, on the floor, unconcious* ….no! NO! *runs towards Ryoko* Mother! Are…are you…?!

Ryoko: *coughs a little blood* ….is…..is Retsuko safe? Is she okay?

Ryota: I….*checks Retsuko’s pulse, and heart* …y-yes. She is fine!

Ryoko: Good….Ryota…keep her safe. Make sure she never has to live with this pain….*voice getting weaker* ever…

Ryota: I-I see…but you’re alright? Please tell me you’re okay! *tears filling up* TELL ME YOU’LL LIVE!

Ryoko: …..I won’t, I’m afraid…..but that’s okay. I lived a wonderful life, Ryota…with you….with Retsuko….Rie….those adorable twins….hmhmhm, I died as I lived….a calm red panda….*smirks* with a lot of death metal rage……*the life drains from her eyes…as she passes on*

Ryota: …..*voice cracking* mother….*sees Retsuko, still unconscious, as he crawl to her, and clings to her* Retsuko, I…..I’m so sorry…..*faintly* I’m so sorry…….*his voice slowly starts getting louder, as his tears begin pouring on* aaaaaAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH! AAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!

*and just like that…he opens his eyes*

Ryota: Wh-wha?! *he jumps up from bed, and finds, it was all a dream* ….what on earth was…..R-Retsuko! *runs out of bed*

*meanwhile, Retsuko and Haida are packing up bags, with everyone else watching*

Rie: …I’m so sorry things turned out like this, sweetheart.

Retsuko: I-it’s fine. Dad probably wouldn’t care, anyways.

Hiroko: So, when will the date be?

Haida: We haven’t decided, but we’ll let you guys know so-*suddenly Ryota runs into the room*

Retsuko: ……d-dad?

Ryota: …..*his eyes start to water, and his face scrunches up slightly, as he begins running towards her*

Retsuko: Uh, what is he doing?!

Rie: Ryota, get away! You’ve done eno-

*Ryota holds onto Retsuko, as if…he’s hugging her*

Retsuko: …..wha…

Riko: Dad…?

Ryota: Retsuko…..*voice cracking, as he starts shaking* I’m sorry…..I’m so sorry….

Retsuko: ….*she begins to cry along with him*…..daddy…

I REALLY wish I had gotten this out sooner, guys, I’m sorry. :( With that said, we’re getting pretty close to the end, for real now! I’d reckon 2, if not one more chapter left, and we would be officially done. This part WAS actually to be longer, but I’ve decided to leave the second half for the next part. Once again, I do apologize for how long you had to wait, it’s not something I was proud of (as I’m sure you probably noticed, with how much I brought it up), but I aim to do better. :) So, with that in mind, see Part 7, this coming 2020! :D

Ryota: *laughs* Okay, okay! *gets up* Sheesh, you girls will be the death of me one day, I swear.

Ryoko: Heh, only one way to find out!

*as they walk closer towards the house, the sky starts turning pitch black, with rain pouring, as Ryota looks up in concern….suddenly feeling older, and worn out*

Ryota: *pants a little* What the hell was…*looks down, and sees Ryoko, and a slightly older Retsuko, on the floor, unconcious* ….no! NO! *runs towards Ryoko* Mother! Are…are you…?!

Ryoko: *coughs a little blood* ….is…..is Retsuko safe? Is she okay?

Ryota: I….*checks Retsuko’s pulse, and heart* …y-yes. She is fine!

Ryoko: Good….Ryota…keep her safe. Make sure she never has to live with this pain….*voice getting weaker* ever…

Ryota: I-I see…but you’re alright? Please tell me you’re okay! *tears filling up* TELL ME YOU’LL LIVE!

Ryoko: …..I won’t, I’m afraid…..but that’s okay. I lived a wonderful life, Ryota…with you….with Retsuko….Rie….those adorable twins….hmhmhm, I died as I lived….a calm red panda….*smirks* with a lot of death metal rage……*the life drains from her eyes…as she passes on*

Ryota: …..*voice cracking* mother….*sees Retsuko, still unconscious, as he crawl to her, and clings to her* Retsuko, I…..I’m so sorry…..*faintly* I’m so sorry…….*his voice slowly starts getting louder, as his tears begin pouring on* aaaaaAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH! AAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!

*and just like that…he opens his eyes*

Ryota: Wh-wha?! *he jumps up from bed, and finds, it was all a dream* ….what on earth was…..R-Retsuko! *runs out of bed*

*meanwhile, Retsuko and Haida are packing up bags, with everyone else watching*

Rie: …I’m so sorry things turned out like this, sweetheart.

Retsuko: I-it’s fine. Dad probably wouldn’t care, anyways.

Hiroko: So, when will the date be?

Haida: We haven’t decided, but we’ll let you guys know so-*suddenly Ryota runs into the room*

Retsuko: ……d-dad?

Ryota: …..*his eyes start to water, and his face scrunches up slightly, as he begins running towards her*

Retsuko: Uh, what is he doing?!

Rie: Ryota, get away! You’ve done eno-

*Ryota holds onto Retsuko, as if…he’s hugging her*

Retsuko: …..wha…

Riko: Dad…?

Ryota: Retsuko…..*voice cracking, as he starts shaking* I’m sorry…..I’m so sorry….

Retsuko: ….*she begins to cry along with him*…..daddy…

I REALLY wish I had gotten this out sooner, guys, I’m sorry. :( With that said, we’re getting pretty close to the end, for real now! I’d reckon 2, if not one more chapter left, and we would be officially done. This part WAS actually to be longer, but I’ve decided to leave the second half for the next part. Once again, I do apologize for how long you had to wait, it’s not something I was proud of (as I’m sure you probably noticed, with how much I brought it up), but I aim to do better. :) So, with that in mind, see Part 7, this coming 2020! :D
